title: Rishi Sunak – 2023 Speech at Finchley United Synagogue
author: admin
summary: The speech made by Rishi Sunak, the Prime Minister, at Finchley United Synagogue on 9 October 2023.
content:
I wanted to come here tonight to stand with you.
  *[ERSA]: Employment Related Services Association
  *[HS2]: High Speed Two
  *[GPs]: general practitioners
